answers.answer: No it can not be caused by a fall.  My best guess is that he was diabetic before the fall but no one had diagnosed it or noticed it until he went into the hospital.

question: CAN TRAUMA CAUSE DIABETES?  MY DAD FELL 25 FEET THROUGH A ROOF.  BEFORE HE WAS ADMITTED TO THE HOSPITAL HE WASN'T A DIABETIC, NOW THEY SAY HE IS.
title: can trauma cause diabetes
